thejungle_25_sinclair_64kb_176.mp3.ground: One thing led to another. In the saloon where Jurgis met "Buck" Halloran he was sitting late one night with Duane, when a "country customer" (a buyer for an out of town merchant) came in, a little more than half "piped."
